resources.string: Levels are being loaded! Please wait a few moments:)
Joehoe, \nBig summer blowout! I accidently left my window open, its very cold!\nCan you help me please?
Joehoe,\nUse the Axe to destroy the iceblocks to reveal the picture. If you use it to often it will cost you more money!
Nice Job!\nThe picture is better visible, try to guess what it is by clicking on the letters. I will help you with this one: click on the letter K!
Dont let me down! The first letter is a K, Im sure!!

Remove letters from your answer, to use hints.
You cannot remove any letters, because you need them all!
You cannot remove any more letters in this level.
Watch out! The volume is very soft!
Are you sure you want to change your language? You will start at level 1, but keep your coins.
